entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_CLASS_2_DESC: Maximum Cost of 35 per Unit or lower
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_CLASS_3_DESC: Maximum Cost of 28 per Unit or lower
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_CLASS_4_DESC: Maximum Cost of 15 per Unit or lower
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_FORMATION101_DESC:
25% boost to Atk of all Units
Wins against Tetra Wall; loses against Kaiser Shield
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_FORMATION102_DESC:
100% boost to Atk, max HP of central Unit
Wins against Chain Formation; loses against Tetra Wall
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_FORMATION103_DESC:
50% boost to Atk of vanguard Units
Wins against Kaiser Shield; loses against Chain Formation
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_FORMATION201_DESC:
25% boost to Def, max HP of all Units
Wins against Raid Vanguard; loses against Martial Formation
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_FORMATION202_DESC:
50% boost to Def, max HP of vanguard Units
Wins against Power Strike; loses against Raid Vanguard
entries.MST_COLOSSEUM_FORMATION203_DESC:
50% boost to Atk, Def of all Units except for central Unit
Wins against Martial Formation; loses against Power Strike
